extendedInfo.description: Do you ever get stumped while playing Scramble With Friends? Not anymore! You just found the easiest and fastest way to get help while playing your favorite scrambled letter puzzle game! Our exclusive transparent overlay appears right on top of your game whenever you need help. All you have to do is trace the line to create the highest scoring words possible! Some may accuse you of cheating, but they're just mad they aren't WINNING!-The most intuitive UI of any Scramble With Friends helper-Ridiculously fast searches de-scramble entire games and generate all valid letter combinations in milliseconds-Increase your vocabulary while beating your friends-Easily switch between getting help and your Scramble game using notifications-Amazing in-game mode allows you to simply trace a line to spell out the best possible words! No other Scramble With Friends cheat app can come close to this!Note: This app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc. - makers of the popular Boggle-style word game Scramble With Friends.As with all epEK.ware apps, comments and feedback on Scramble With Help For Friends are always appreciated. A link to my email address can be found within the app.

reviews.title: Omg it works!
reviews.comment: Works well!  Even for this user who\'s  not so technically inclined.  Helpful, clear instructions provided. Love it.  (and trying not to cheat too often, but it\'s nice to have for once and a while)
reviews.author: Kelly Kuglitsch

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: I like that its cheap to upgrade to the screenshot version, and I like that it deletes the screenshots after using it so it doesn\'t fill my gallery with a ton of scramble pics. It would be nice, however, if there was an option to show highest-scoring words for that game rather than just random and alphabetical...
reviews.author: Becca Davis

reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.comment: I paid for the application because I love the game...then it tells me after weeks that I can no longer bill my mobile account..I then input my debit info (which) I am against and it begins to charge me for the tokens but I never receive them even though I receive a confirmation email from Google play that my order was successful and it is taken from my account and by the time I\'m able to check everything... Guess what? the 15 min have gone to obtain a refund! What crap! I will switch to AT&T if not resolved

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Evertime I switch to game mode in a middle of a game it crashes n then I have to pause go back to the app retype the letters start over n does the samething all over I\'m wasting time n I still get beat cause I lost time so frustrating!!
reviews.author: chelsey sternad

reviews.title: Totally sucks!
reviews.comment: Kept asking if I Had installed the application. Waste of time. My touch 4g.
reviews.author: Pritee Broughn

reviews.title: Screenshot
reviews.comment: I loved this app and I bought the screenshot add-on but when I updated my nexus 7 it didn\'t let me do the screenshot anymore
reviews.author: Wesley White

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just wish the full version was an app because In-App purchases don\'t work well with me
reviews.author: Saahil Mehta

reviews.title: Its good
reviews.comment: Love it but screen. Shot doesn\'t work I\'ve emailed them but haven\'t got a response
reviews.author: Kezza Tydeman

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I absolutly love it!!!!!! It helps me on every single one and uses words i didnt even know!!!!! <3<3<3
reviews.author: Ashley Morse

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says! Instructions were a little confusing at first, then I got it. *I only use this against my hardest opponents, though; I\'m not \"always\"a cheater* ;-P ~Sprint htc evo & samsung epic galaxy s~
reviews.author: Crystal Kolb

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Good app!
reviews.author: Alicia Malone

reviews.comment: Will not show up on game for me to use. Uninstalled and installed again and still won\'t work. Ready to delete it for good.
reviews.author: Mike Cribb

reviews.title: Weak app
reviews.comment: This app sucks
reviews.author: Frank Frye

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works great on my Motorola Droid Razr
reviews.author: Noel Perez

reviews.title: Galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: This sucks!! Wast of money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Random button?!?
reviews.comment: The random button too close to the next button. If you accidentally hit it then you are screwed. The random button is useless anyway because it doesn\'t necessarily show common words.
reviews.author: Jesse Corns

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This is great! My scores have gone wayyyy up. I don\'t cheat against everyone, just a few friends I couldn\'t beat before.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but could be better
reviews.comment: This could display multiple words at a time, and have a mode to shuffle words leaving towards a mix of valuable words and regular words. The current shuffle just tends to give words from whatever the mode of the board scores is. I didn\'t even know apps could write on top of other apps!
reviews.author: Jay Reed

reviews.title: Sucks...
reviews.comment: Should make it where it automatically shifts to next word after u put in the current. I score below my average with this app...
reviews.author: Michael Singnhoth

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Lovve it glad they added the shuffle feature
reviews.author: Venise Clarke
